meanings.definition: To join in a league or alliance.
meanings.sent1: The superheroes leagued together to defeat the villain.
meanings.sent2: The countries leagued for a common cause.
meanings.sent3: The animals leagued to protect their forest from harm.
meanings.sent4: The students leagued to protest against unfair rules.
meanings.sent5: The friends leagued to organize a surprise party for their friend.

meanings.definition: A group of sports teams that compete against each other.
meanings.sent1: The baseball leagued had a championship game last night.
meanings.sent2: Our school is part of the soccer league.
meanings.sent3: The basketball league had an unexpected winner this season.
meanings.sent4: The football league's final match was filled with excitement.
meanings.sent5: The hockey league's teams were evenly matched in skill.
